Detailed Description

template<typename Point>
class zorder_lt< Point >

Wrapper class for various Z-Order operations.

Z-order Less Than Operator This class provides an interface with several specialized worker classes which control some functions based on the Z-order of multi-dimensional points. The actual work is done by the zorder_lt_worker class, which is specialized based on the type of coordinates being used.

Parameters:
Point The point type being used.

void zorder_lt< Point >::dist_sq_between_quad_boxes ( const Point &  q1,
const Point &  q2,
const Point &  p1,
const Point &  p2,
double &  dist,
double &  radius1,
double &  radius2 
) [inline]

Computes the distance between two quadtree boxes defined by two sets of two points.

Distance (Squared) between two Quadtree Boxs This function first computes the minimum enclosing quadtree boxs for two sets of two points, then computes the minimum distance between them. If the boxes overlap, the distance will be 0.

Parameters:
q1 First point defining first box
q2 Second point defining first box
p1 First point defining second box
p2 Second point defining second box
dist Return value, squared distance between quadtree boxes, 0 if overlap
radius1 Return value, side length of the first quadtree box
radius2 Return value, side length of the second quadtree box
template<typename Point>
double zorder_lt< Point >::dist_sq_to_quad_box ( const Point &  q,
const Point &  p1,
const Point &  p2 
) [inline]

Computes the distance from a query point to the smallest quadtree box containing two other points.

Distance (Squared) to Quadtree Box This function first computes the minimum enclosing quadtree box for two points, then computes the square distance from the query point to that quadtree box. If the query point lies within the quadtree box, the distance returned will be 0. This function calls the appropriate function in the specialized z_order_worker class.

Parameters:
q Query point
p1 First quadtree box defining point
p2 Second quadtree box defining point
Returns:
Squared distance from q to quadtree box. 0 if q lies within box

template<typename Point>
bool zorder_lt< Point >::operator() ( const Mypair< typename std::vector< Point >::iterator, typename std::vector< long unsigned int >::iterator > &  p,
const Mypair< typename std::vector< Point >::iterator, typename std::vector< long unsigned int >::iterator > &  q 
) [inline]

Calls less than operator.

Function Object Operator This function determines whether one point preceeds the other in a Z-ordering. In this instance of the function, the points are taken from a Mypair of iterator types. This is used to sort two vectors simultaneously. See pair_iter.hpp.

Parameters:
p First point
q Second point
Returns:
True if p comes before q in the Z-ordering of the points

Calls less than operator.

Function Object Operator This function determines whether one point preceeds the other in a Z-ordering by calling the appropriate function in the specialized z_order_worker class
